channel.title: Timetable
channel.description: A microcast with Manton Reece about working on Micro.blog.
channel.itunes:author: Manton Reece

item.title: Episode 124: Major distraction
item.description: A quick recap of last night’s longer-than-expected server upgrade. I also talk about progress on the Indie Microblogging book, and Ghost import.
item.itunes:subtitle: A quick recap of last night’s longer-than-expected server upgrade. I also talk about progress on the Indie Microblogging book, and Ghost import.
item.itunes:summary: A quick recap of last night’s longer-than-expected server upgrade. I also talk about progress on the Indie Microblogging book, and Ghost import.

item.title: Episode 123: Newsletter prep
item.description: Today I’m getting the 3rd email newsletter ready, plus talking about server downtime and learning how to communicate mistakes, with AirPower as an example.
item.itunes:subtitle: Today I’m getting the 3rd email newsletter ready, plus talking about server downtime and learning how to communicate mistakes, with AirPower as an example.
item.itunes:summary: Today I’m getting the 3rd email newsletter ready, plus talking about server downtime and learning how to communicate mistakes, with AirPower as an example.

item.title: Episode 122: Video hosting
item.description: Rolling out video upload and hosting for Micro.blog-hosted sites, why it’s priced the way it is, and more improvements to work on.
item.itunes:subtitle: Rolling out video upload and hosting for Micro.blog-hosted sites, why it’s priced the way it is, and more improvements to work on.
item.itunes:summary: Rolling out video upload and hosting for Micro.blog-hosted sites, why it’s priced the way it is, and more improvements to work on.

item.title: Episode 121: Saved drafts
item.description: About the new features in Micro.blog for saving post drafts and the updated Mac app.
item.itunes:subtitle: About the new features in Micro.blog for saving post drafts and the updated Mac app.
item.itunes:summary: About the new features in Micro.blog for saving post drafts and the updated Mac app.

item.title: Episode 120: Shipping tomorrow
item.description: Taking a break today to watch the Apple services-related event. Preparing new Micro.blog features to release tomorrow.
item.itunes:subtitle: Taking a break today to watch the Apple services-related event. Preparing new Micro.blog features to release tomorrow.
item.itunes:summary: Taking a break today to watch the Apple services-related event. Preparing new Micro.blog features to release tomorrow.

item.title: Episode 119: Finally stickers
item.description: Micro.blog stickers for Kickstarter backers are arriving this week! Also: Sunlit 2.4 is approved and will be released soon.
item.itunes:subtitle: Micro.blog stickers for Kickstarter backers are arriving this week! Also: Sunlit 2.4 is approved and will be released soon.
item.itunes:summary: Micro.blog stickers for Kickstarter backers are arriving this week! Also: Sunlit 2.4 is approved and will be released soon.

item.title: Episode 118: Moment of panic
item.description: Troubleshooting server problems.
item.itunes:subtitle: Troubleshooting server problems.
item.itunes:summary: Troubleshooting server problems.

item.title: Episode 117: No downtime
item.description: Some of the work this week including fixing the Sunlit crashing bug, updating the Micro.blog help site, and whether I should take the servers down for an upgrade.
item.itunes:subtitle: Some of the work this week including fixing the Sunlit crashing bug, updating the Micro.blog help site, and whether I should take the servers down for an upgrade.
item.itunes:summary: Some of the work this week including fixing the Sunlit crashing bug, updating the Micro.blog help site, and whether I should take the servers down for an upgrade.

item.title: Episode 116: Breaking up Facebook
item.description: This is an expanded audio version of my blog post today about Facebook and Instagram.
item.itunes:subtitle: This is an expanded audio version of my blog post today about Facebook and Instagram.
item.itunes:summary: This is an expanded audio version of my blog post today about Facebook and Instagram.

item.title: Episode 115: Parsing usernames
item.description: More recent work in Micro.blog for ActivityPub and domain name improvements.
item.itunes:subtitle: More recent work in Micro.blog for ActivityPub and domain name improvements.
item.itunes:summary: More recent work in Micro.blog for ActivityPub and domain name improvements.

item.title: Episode 114: Migrated podcast
item.description: Moving this podcast over to Micro.blog hosting, and thoughts on the Mastodon support we just launched.
item.itunes:subtitle: Moving this podcast over to Micro.blog hosting, and thoughts on the Mastodon support we just launched.
item.itunes:summary: Moving this podcast over to Micro.blog hosting, and thoughts on the Mastodon support we just launched.

item.title: Episode 113: Focus on smaller networks
item.description: An update on microcasting improvements, then thoughts on how the recent articles about Alex Jones and the problems with big social networks always stop short of any solutions. Intro music from Aaron Parecki’s 100 days of music.
item.itunes:subtitle: An update on microcasting improvements, then thoughts on how the recent articles about Alex Jones and the problems with big social networks always stop short of any solutions. Intro music from Aaron Parecki’s 100 days of music.
item.itunes:summary: An update on microcasting improvements, then thoughts on how the recent articles about Alex Jones and the problems with big social networks always stop short of any solutions. Intro music from Aaron Parecki’s 100 days of music.

item.title: Episode 112: To-do list for podcasting
item.description: Upcoming improvements to podcasting and some more thoughts on Anchor after listening to episode 35 of the Supertop podcast. Also, I misspoke the IndieWeb URL on this episode. The site deaths page is here.
item.itunes:subtitle: Upcoming improvements to podcasting and some more thoughts on Anchor after listening to episode 35 of the Supertop podcast. Also, I misspoke the IndieWeb URL on this episode. The site deaths page is here.
item.itunes:summary: Upcoming improvements to podcasting and some more thoughts on Anchor after listening to episode 35 of the Supertop podcast. Also, I misspoke the IndieWeb URL on this episode. The site deaths page is here.

item.title: Episode 111: Kicking off Homebrew Website Club
item.description: Following up on the Facebook API submission and last night’s Homebrew Website Club. The meetup is the first Wednesday of each month at Mozart’s Coffee.
item.itunes:subtitle: Following up on the Facebook API submission and last night’s Homebrew Website Club. The meetup is the first Wednesday of each month at Mozart’s Coffee.
item.itunes:summary: Following up on the Facebook API submission and last night’s Homebrew Website Club. The meetup is the first Wednesday of each month at Mozart’s Coffee.

item.title: Episode 110: Maybe a bullet journal
item.description: I just sent off the Facebook pages cross-posting for Facebook to hopefully approve, plus wondering if I should try a bullet journal to get more organized.
item.itunes:subtitle: I just sent off the Facebook pages cross-posting for Facebook to hopefully approve, plus wondering if I should try a bullet journal to get more organized.
item.itunes:summary: I just sent off the Facebook pages cross-posting for Facebook to hopefully approve, plus wondering if I should try a bullet journal to get more organized.

item.title: Episode 109: First to 30 episodes
item.description: How competition changes when you stick with something, with a few clips from the NBA Arena Tour podcast.
item.itunes:subtitle: How competition changes when you stick with something, with a few clips from the NBA Arena Tour podcast.
item.itunes:summary: How competition changes when you stick with something, with a few clips from the NBA Arena Tour podcast.

item.title: Episode 108: Facebook changes
item.description: I start by talking about microcasts, then go into the big job this week: adapting Micro.blog for Facebook’s API changes, plus thoughts on Twitter’s upcoming API changes too.
item.itunes:subtitle: I start by talking about microcasts, then go into the big job this week: adapting Micro.blog for Facebook’s API changes, plus thoughts on Twitter’s upcoming API changes too.
item.itunes:summary: I start by talking about microcasts, then go into the big job this week: adapting Micro.blog for Facebook’s API changes, plus thoughts on Twitter’s upcoming API changes too.

item.title: Episode 107: More of the YouTube model
item.description: I talk about the new performance improvement to Micro.blog posting, then take a detour into centralized podcasting hosts like Anchor and why I like Micro.blog’s business model better.
item.itunes:subtitle: I talk about the new performance improvement to Micro.blog posting, then take a detour into centralized podcasting hosts like Anchor and why I like Micro.blog’s business model better.
item.itunes:summary: I talk about the new performance improvement to Micro.blog posting, then take a detour into centralized podcasting hosts like Anchor and why I like Micro.blog’s business model better.

item.title: Episode 106: Dramatically faster
item.description: While out running a couple errands, I recorded this episode about an upcoming performance improvement to Micro.blog posting, with a follow-up on the recent new sign-up change.
item.itunes:subtitle: While out running a couple errands, I recorded this episode about an upcoming performance improvement to Micro.blog posting, with a follow-up on the recent new sign-up change.
item.itunes:summary: While out running a couple errands, I recorded this episode about an upcoming performance improvement to Micro.blog posting, with a follow-up on the recent new sign-up change.

item.title: Episode 105: Users without a blog
item.description: To start off the week, I talk about a bug that led to many users not creating a microblog after registering an account on Micro.blog.
item.itunes:subtitle: To start off the week, I talk about a bug that led to many users not creating a microblog after registering an account on Micro.blog.
item.itunes:summary: To start off the week, I talk about a bug that led to many users not creating a microblog after registering an account on Micro.blog.

item.title: Episode 104: Freshman orientation
item.description: Colleges often have a 2-day orientation to get students and parents ready for the school year to start. Micro.blog needs something like that.
item.itunes:subtitle: Colleges often have a 2-day orientation to get students and parents ready for the school year to start. Micro.blog needs something like that.
item.itunes:summary: Colleges often have a 2-day orientation to get students and parents ready for the school year to start. Micro.blog needs something like that.

item.title: Episode 103: IndieWeb Summit
item.description: I’m back from Portland and rolling out new features for Micro.blog.
item.itunes:subtitle: I’m back from Portland and rolling out new features for Micro.blog.
item.itunes:summary: I’m back from Portland and rolling out new features for Micro.blog.

item.title: Episode 102: Momentum
item.description: I talk about the just-released beta of Dialog, an Android app for Micro.blog, and the ability to delete accounts.
item.itunes:subtitle: I talk about the just-released beta of Dialog, an Android app for Micro.blog, and the ability to delete accounts.
item.itunes:summary: I talk about the just-released beta of Dialog, an Android app for Micro.blog, and the ability to delete accounts.

item.title: Episode 101: While waiting
item.description: I talk about the upcoming Icro release and what to do while waiting on things like the App Store that are outside our control.
item.itunes:subtitle: I talk about the upcoming Icro release and what to do while waiting on things like the App Store that are outside our control.
item.itunes:summary: I talk about the upcoming Icro release and what to do while waiting on things like the App Store that are outside our control.

item.title: Episode 100: One year
item.description: I record a microcast in the rain and talk about the new Micro.blog for Mac app and the fact that we’re a year in to Micro.blog.
item.itunes:subtitle: I record a microcast in the rain and talk about the new Micro.blog for Mac app and the fact that we’re a year in to Micro.blog.
item.itunes:summary: I record a microcast in the rain and talk about the new Micro.blog for Mac app and the fact that we’re a year in to Micro.blog.

item.description: I talk about the latest iOS update, why square photos are great, and responding to support email.
item.itunes:subtitle: I talk about the latest iOS update, why square photos are great, and responding to support email.
item.itunes:summary: I talk about the latest iOS update, why square photos are great, and responding to support email.

item.itunes:subtitle: Wrapping up the release of Wavelength and microcast support in Micro.blog.
item.itunes:summary: Wrapping up the release of Wavelength and microcast support in Micro.blog.

item.title: Episode 97: Not quite there

item.itunes:summary: Anticipating a new feature for Micro.blog and rolling out some server improvements.

item.title: Episode 96: Name brainstorming
item.description: Quick thoughts on Apple’s education event in Chicago, their new app Schoolwork, and the process for naming new apps. (And yes, I call it Schoolroom in the podcast by accident.)
item.itunes:subtitle: Quick thoughts on Apple’s education event in Chicago, their new app Schoolwork, and the process for naming new apps. (And yes, I call it Schoolroom in the podcast by accident.)

item.description: Wrapping up today’s announcements, including a new Micro Monday and Micro.blog for Mac version 1.2.

item.itunes:summary: Wrapping up today’s announcements, including a new Micro Monday and Micro.blog for Mac version 1.2.

item.itunes:summary: Working on a lot of things at once, and thoughts on the new Micro Monday microcast.

item.title: Episode 93: Preparing Sunlit 2.0
item.description: The microcast is back! I talk about the final steps to get Sunlit 2.0 shipped and what we hope for the release.

item.itunes:summary: The microcast is back! I talk about the final steps to get Sunlit 2.0 shipped and what we hope for the release.

item.title: Episode 92: Good, better, best
item.description:
Good, better, best.
Never let it rest.
‘Til your good is better
& your better is your best.
item.itunes:subtitle:
Good, better, best.
Never let it rest.
‘Til your good is better
& your better is your best.
item.itunes:summary:
Good, better, best.
Never let it rest.
‘Til your good is better

item.description: Listening to Eminem, the Killers, and thinking about giving Micro.blog everything this year. Closing music cover by OZsound.

item.itunes:summary: Final plans for IndieWebCamp, ordering breakfast, and punting on opening up Micro.blog.

item.itunes:summary: More delays launching Micro.blog, last-minute fixes, rate limiting, and more.
